about_the_game:
There are 120 spells in the game, divided into 8 elements, each 15 spells. Each character can use different spell elements. Lead to different gameplay.



There are 78 artifacts in the game, divided into 4 rarities. Special[Green]: 29 pieces, Rare[Cyan]: 29 pieces, Epic[Purple]: 14 pieces, and Legendary[Gold]: 6 pieces. The higher the rarity of the artifact, the stronger it is in general. I don't like some game will drop some "golden legend" that is not even as good as a white equipment for the sake of balance. -_-||



There are 151 talents that increase a character's attributes or provide a variety of additional game mechanics effects. The constructs of talents and spells are the core gameplay of this game. The right talent can change you from an ordinary mage to a god of war who destroys the army! (100,000+ kills in a single run, killing BOSSes in seconds!)



There are 22 Tarot cards that provide various special effects. However, they are very precious and are usually obtained by killing BOSSes!



Different players can play battles of different difficulties depending on their technique and understanding of the game.


There is a significant difference in difficulty between the 3 maps.


There are 20 difficulty levels.



There are 6 different game modes.


There are 10 challenges using special rules!




Gain experience directly by killing enemies, and don't worry about being surrounded by monsters can not upgrade and repressed to death.


Unique mana management system: Mana is consumed when using spell. Activating an artifact requires occuping a portion of mana., and activating too many artifacts may not have enough mana to use spell.
Mana management and balance is not only the feature of the game design, but also the difficulty of the game.
Even the most powerful mage is weak without an adequate mana.


Many changeable game settings to customize your gaming experience!



Cool Slay! You as a powerful mage can kill thousands of enemies ...... that's just common! You can even kill over 100,000 enemies in 20 minutes, just like the Grim Reaper!

Multiple builds. Because there are a total of 371 skills in the game, players are able to construct multiple builds! I'm not going to brag about being able to form thousands of combinations like other games do, that's just mathematical permutations and combinations that have no real meaning. But I can say that this game can combine at least 5 mainstream builds and more than a dozen unique builds. It's fine if you want berserk mage or unbreakable mage, it depends on your knowledge and preference of skills.





Earn money quickly to power-up & Unlock skills quickly!
If you survive long enough, you'll get many money. There are even builds within the game that specialize in earn money. Achievement completion conditions are easy and you can unlock many skills very quickly.



There's no penalty for failure and a reward for winning! Failure in the Roguelike game is perfectly normal, so don't worry too much about it. But with a victory in this game, each character will unlock CG as your reward! ^_^



  • 1. The faster you kill monsters, the faster you level up.
  • 2. Spells and artifacts need to be centrally upgraded, and quickly increasing the level of the same spell or artifact can make them more powerful.
  • 3. Please choose a reasonable key button for spell.
  • 4. It is not necessary to learn attack spell in all 6 spell slots, learning one or two Support spell may lead to better survival.
  • 5. Talents have little impact on artifacts. But they can make a qualitative change in spell!
  • 6. Don't rush to pick up items, wait until you need them. They won't disappear.
  • 7. Don't be afraid of BOSS, it's here to give gifts! ^_^
  • 8. If you have any questions during the game, please read the FAQ and the Tutorial first.
  • 9. Pay attention to the types of enemies, Guards can limit your movement!
  • 10. Mana is very important in this game. If you like to use spell, "Mana Regeneration" and "Spell Mana Cost" are great enhancements to buy. If you like to use artifacts, "Max Mana" is more valuable to you.
  • 11. Luck is very important in Roguelike game , both on your own part and within the parameters of the game.
  • 12. If you're an unlucky person like me. Then I suggest that you can plan your game well first in a run. Fill up one kind skill slots first, then you won't randomize unwanted skills of that kind.










There is no plot within the game. Let me slowly add character stories and worldviews in future series game. ^_^



Thank you for being willing to see the end, this is my first game to be released on Steam. If you like this game, I hope you can buy it to support my game production dream, and welcome to recommend it to friends!

content_descriptors.notes: Heroine wears sexy outfit, and she have frame animations of chest movements.

detailed_description:
Table of Contents

  • 1. Instructions for Game Plan Completion
  • 2. Please note before purchase
  • 3. Skill Encyclopedia Showcase
  • 4. Difficulty Adaptive
  • 5. Game Features
  • 6. Game Tips
  • 7. Character Profile


Final Update Schedule


After 8 months of continuous updates, the game was released as an official version.
Unfortunately, Steam Workshop cannot be supported with my coding skills and the game has not reached the condition of opening the Steam Points Store. Other than that the all game plan content was achieved.
Please be assured that the bonus CGs will still be updated to the game once the sales target is reached. ^_^

I will still continue to make games of "Etaine" series after this, so stay tuned!


Please note before purchase

  • 1. This game has no real adult content, only Nudity (No nipples or pussy). If you want to buy adult game, then it may not be able to meet your needs. But you can still look at the CG in the preview image first, which can help you understand the sexy girls of this game.
  • 2. I only have 1920* 1080,1366 *768 monitor. If your monitor is not 16:9, it is recommended to use "Window Mode" to play the game (especially with long fish screen). If the image is mismatched, I apologize to you, it is that I do not have the money to buy advanced monitors for game testing.
  • 3. This game is based on the principle of "good steel is used to the edge", the funds are basically invested in the characters (character drawing, CG and animation frames), so the skills effect, icons and sound effects in the game are all from the Assets Store. If you are very resistant to these common assets, the game is difficult to meet your needs.
  • 4. This game is a VS like game with sexy girls, if you want to play a light, can see some sexy girls in VS like game, then you can try this game. If you want an S-class VS like game like Brotato, this game is difficult to meet your needs.
  • 5. Some game design of this game is different from other VS like, please read the tutorial. If you prefer fully automatic combat, you can turn on the "Auto Cast Spell" and "Auto Aim" functions in the Settings.
  • 6. The game is a little difficult in the novice phase, but after understanding the game designs and some skills' ability, you can easily kill all enemies (about two or three Run).
  • 7. If you feel it is easy to die using Icy, you can try to use Sally (take the artifact route bulid), Sister is very hard to die. ^_^

  • 8. If you want to play the game with a controller. Be sure to link the controller to your computer before opening the game! Otherwise the game may not recognize the controller, making controller not work!

name: Etaine: Magic Survivor / 伊泰恩：魔法幸存者

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy Etaine: Magic Survivor / 伊泰恩：魔法幸存者

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Win 7
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i3-8145U CPU @ 2.10GHz 2.30 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics 620
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Win 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 5600X 6-Core Processor 3.70 GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Etaine: Magic Survivor is a top-down arena shooter survival roguelite game. You can construct your skill set through spell, artifacts, talents and tarot cards. Become mage of unbreakable or fatal, it's your choice! Will you be able to survive when you against the thousands of monsters？
supported_languages: Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, English, Japanese, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Korean
